publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4642 Margaret Jamieson: Crosshouse Hospital Volunteers—That the Parliament congratulates, and wishes continued success to, the 660 volunteers at Crosshouse Hospital, Kilmarnock, who in the five years since they commenced activity have gifted £1,000,000 for the benefit of patients, staff and visitors of the hospital. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support

S2M-4642 Margaret Jamieson: Crosshouse Hospital Volunteers—That the Parliament congratulates, and wishes continued success to, the 660 volunteers at Crosshouse Hospital, Kilmarnock, who in the five years since they commenced activity have gifted £1,000,000 for the benefit of patients, staff and visitors of the hospital.
S2M-4642 Crosshouse Hospital Volunteers (lodged on 29 June 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4642 Crosshouse Hospital Volunteers (lodged on 29 June 2006) Irene Oldfather*
